title: Harrowed World: What's Past Is Portents - Vampire Visual Novel
description: Step into a dark and unforgiving world where vampires pull the strings of humanity. You are not the hero, you are not the villain, you are nothing but a pawn in schemes that you cannot even begin to understand.
longDescription:
<!--image-->
![Harrowed World: What's Past Is Portents - Vampire Visual Novel-129df](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/1082c1eab7774417b71a4cb174d66b7f/harrowed-world-whats-past-is-portents--vampire-visual-novel-129df.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Step into a dark and unforgiving world where vampires pull the strings of humanity. You are not the hero, you are not the villain, you are nothing but a pawn in schemes that you cannot even begin to understand.

Become enthralled by the insidious immortals that have secretly dominated world affairs for centuries in this captivating narrative experience, elegantly presented in a gothic-style visual novel format.

‘Harrowed World: What's Past Is Portents’, introduces you to an important character and faction from the upcoming vampire RPG ‘Harrowed World: Portents In Red’.

<!--image-->
![Harrowed World: What's Past Is Portents - Vampire Visual Novel-rzhlw](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/1082c1eab7774417b71a4cb174d66b7f/harrowed-world-whats-past-is-portents--vampire-visual-novel-rzhlw.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Step into the shoes of Isaac Ambrose, an altar boy at the quaint local church.

Your curiosity gets the better of you as you come across something that will change the course of your life forever.

Some things are better left secret, kept hidden away from prying eyes.

What awaits you behind the veil is a world far more intricate and unsettling than you’d ever dared conceive.

<!--image-->
![Harrowed World: What's Past Is Portents-1wevx](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/1082c1eab7774417b71a4cb174d66b7f/harrowed-world-whats-past-is-portents-1wevx.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
- NEW: Voice Acting!

- NEW: Internal Achievements System!

- NEW: Lexicon System!

- Isaac's Story Duration: 15 minutes approx. 

- Future Stories as DLC (coming soon).

- Controller Support (partially tested).

- Designed to be played multiple times.

- Unravel captivating layers of lore.

- Uncover the canon ending and multiple alternative game over endings.

- Mac and Linux Support (untested).

<!--image-->
![Harrowed World: What's Past Is Portents - Vampire Visual Novel-2qssv](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/1082c1eab7774417b71a4cb174d66b7f/harrowed-world-whats-past-is-portents--vampire-visual-novel-2qssv.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
A dark and twisted version of our world, where the supernatural exists just below the surface. Vampires, magical folk, and other beings exist in a constant struggle for power and influence. Through sinister cabals and insatiable corporate empires these creatures hold sway over human society.

<!--image-->
![Harrowed World: What's Past Is Portents - Vampire Visual Novel-1ywja](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/1082c1eab7774417b71a4cb174d66b7f/harrowed-world-whats-past-is-portents--vampire-visual-novel-1ywja.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Ordinary people live in blissful ignorance of the dark forces at work around them. Follow these supernatural beings through a grim dystopian atmosphere filled with gothic horror and a tangled web of morality where peril lurks around every corner.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Support
<!--text-->
If you are a member of the Discord server and you need support, you can simply use the support channel.

Alternatively, you can get in touch via the contact form on the website.
